trans-unit.resname: PHEL·6 | Avacyn, Angel of Hope | Card Name
PHEL·6 | Avacyn, Angel of Hope | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.
trans-unit.target: Flying, vigilance, indestructible Other permanents you control have indestructible.

trans-unit.resname: PHEL·6 | Avacyn, Angel of Hope | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.
trans-unit.target: A golden helix streaked skyward from the Helvault. A thunderous explosion shattered the silver monolith and Avacyn emerged, free from her prison at last.

trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.
trans-unit.target: Flying, lifelink Pay 7 life: Draw seven cards.

trans-unit.source: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."\n—Thalia, Knight-Cathar
trans-unit.target: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."\n—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

trans-unit.resname: PHEL·208 | Bruna, Light of Alabaster | Card Name
PHEL·208 | Bruna, Light of Alabaster | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, vigilance Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.
trans-unit.target: Flying, vigilance Whenever Bruna, Light of Alabaster attacks or blocks, you may attach to it any number of Auras on the battlefield and you may put onto the battlefield attached to it any number of Aura cards that could enchant it from your graveyard and/or hand.

trans-unit.resname: PHEL·209 | Gisela, Blade of Goldnight | Card Name
PHEL·209 | Gisela, Blade of Goldnight | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.
trans-unit.target: Flying, first strike If a source would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, that source deals double that damage to that player or permanent instead. If a source would deal damage to you or a permanent you control, prevent half that damage, rounded up.

trans-unit.resname: PHEL·210 | Sigarda, Host of Herons | Card Name
PHEL·210 | Sigarda, Host of Herons | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, hexproof Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.
trans-unit.target: Flying, hexproof Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause you to sacrifice permanents.

trans-unit.resname: PHEL·210 | Sigarda, Host of Herons | Flavor Text
